Nice to meet you again {Sir/Madam}, How: What do you think of my commanding?
Good day. What can I do for you?
I want to buy a new weapon. What do you have in stock?
I am looking for some new uniforms. Show me what you have.
I am thinking of buying a horse.
Ah, yes {sir/madam}. These arms are the best you'll find anywhere.
Of course, {sir/madam}. You won't find better quality uniforms anywhere in this army.
You have a fine eye for horses, {sir/madam}. You won't find better beasts than these anywhere else.
Sir, I bring orders for you to take on the next mission, are you prepared?
It is a honor to meet you, {Sir/Madam}. How can I be of service?
Not at this time Sir, Have a nice evening.
Give me the orders! I shall leave at once.
